Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Initial Online Release Added support for common media files like MP4, MP3, Wav(Wave), MPG(MPEG), MKV, FLV, WMV, AVI and DVD VOB files. Added Mute and Volume function Added File handling Bug fixes

English.Char_Desc_45: Remove unwanted media files clean media libra
English.Char_Desc_80: Remove unwanted media files, clean your media collection with ease & gain space
English.Char_Desc_250: Remove unwanted media files, clean your media collection with ease and gain more free space for your favorites! MediaCleaner supports all major media files which are common now a days like MP4, MP3, Wav(Wave), MPG(MPEG), MKV, FLV, WMV, AVI and VOB
English.Char_Desc_450: Remove unwanted media files, clean your media collection with ease and gain more free space for your favorites! MediaCleaner supports all major media files which are common now a days like MP4, MP3, Wav(Wave), MPG(MPEG), MKV, FLV, WMV, AVI and DVD VOB files.
English.Char_Desc_2000: MediaCleaner Your free Media Collection Cleaner Remove unwanted media files, clean your media collection with ease and gain more free space for your favorites! MediaCleaner supports all major media files which are common now a days like MP4, MP3, Wav(Wave), MPG(MPEG), MKV, FLV, WMV, AVI and DVD VOB files. MediaCleaner has all the basic features of a Media Player like play, pause, stop, next and previous functions. It also has a volume control. The player can also be muted by clicking the speaker icon on the main interface dialog. The files deleted from hard disk are sent to recycle bin and the files deleted from Flash/USB Stick or Removable media are permanently deleted. (Be careful when deleting from removable media/usb stick.)

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: MediaCleaner can be freely distributed over the internet in an unchanged form and without any charges
